titleStmt.title: Mercurius Britanicus his spectacles, sent to Iudge Jenkins to peruse his recantation, (with some queries taken out of his Confession,] [sic] in vindication of the Parliament of England.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Judge David Jenkins was imprisoned in the Tower as a royalist during Civil War and Commonwealth.
Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
